transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji, good morning sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning. Sir, meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji sir, main Ashraf baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke head office se. Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Ji actually mein sir ek feedback aaya tha ki 15-20 dinon se koi zyada achi lead inquiries nahi aa rahi hai. Aisa ek mail aaya tha mere paas.
Customer: Hmm. Number likh.
Executive: Haan, number bataiye mujhe ek minute.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Bataiye. 9714.
Customer: 9714.
Customer: 9 9 55552.
Executive: 55552.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Customer: Haan. 971. Aadhe ghante mein phone karna sir.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. 55552. Good name sir?
Customer: Sakshi.
Executive: Sakshi ji. Theek hai, theek hai. Main inse baat karta hun aadhe ghante baad. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No good lead inquiries in the last 15-20 days.



Resolution:

- Executive took the contact number to investigate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, feedback
